content:
We apologize for any confusion regarding the discount code feature. As per our agreement, the calculation of the discount percentage based on the code entered was not included in the scope of the project. However, we understand that you are now requesting this feature. To proceed with this request, we would need to revise the scope of the project and discuss additional costs for this additional work.
We have added the feature that shows the discount amount that has been applied to the cart screen for user reference. Please let us know if there are any other concerns or issues you have and we will do our best to address them. We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.
